Action Items:

  • Update your own leadership values and principles to align with the company's stated values. Document areas of overlap and areas of difference.
  • Create a feedback and recognition framework for management. This is to include anticipated cadence and examples for new and existing managers to learn from.
  • Identify areas for internal career advancement and create skeleton for cross-training and upskilling programs.
  • Develop (or update) a leadership and management training program, noting the cultural gaps identified in Observe.

Collateral: Leadership Training Program materials - workbook, videos, documentation.
